name: Assemble the Team
text: Uses (0 Bonds). Limit 1 per investigator. Attached asset does not take up an Ally slot. [reaction] When you would play an Ally card and Assemble the Team is not attached to a card, if that Ally costs less than the number of bonds on this card: Remove all bonds on , reduce the cost of that Ally to 0, and attach this card to it. After an Ally card enters play at your location: Place 1 resource on as a bond.

name: Beseeching Prayer
text:
[reaction] After a skill test at your location ends, if an [eldersign] was revealed during that test and Beseeching Prayer is unexhausted: Seal (<eld>).

<rea> When a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test, exhaust <fullname>: Resolve the token sealed here, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag. Then reveal another token.

name: Discarded Dogtags
text: [reaction] After you take 1 or more damage, take 1  damage and exhaust Discarded Dogtags: Gain 1 resource and heal 1 horror.

name: Close Quarters
text: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed and have a modified skill value of least 3 [agility] during this skill test, including icons on cards you commited, this attack deals an additional +2 damage.

name: Distribute Supplies
text:
Each investigator may choose 1 of the following options:
-  Spend 2 resources. Then, another investigator gains 3 resources.

<bul> Discard a card. Then, another investigator draws 1 card.
<hs>
<bul> Discard 1 asset you control. Then, another investigator plays an asset. Reduce it's cost by 1.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose a Humanoid enemy at your location and test [combat] (4). You may use your [intellect] value for this test. If you succeed, discover 2 clues at your location. If this test fails, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Absolute Focus
text: You get +2 [willpower], +2 [intellect], and +2 [agility] during this skill test.

name: Insult
text: Fast. Choose a non-Elite enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move 1 damage on it to this card. [reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 1 card and gain 2 resources.

name: Lie in Wait
text: [free] During the enemy phase, take an action as if it was your turn (this does count toward the number of actions you can take each turn and can provoke attacks of opportunity).

name: Rushed to the scene
text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. [reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for a Firearm Asset with Uses (X ammo), and play it, reducing it's cost by 2, with 0 ammo on it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose a Humanoid enemy at your location and test [combat] (4). You may use your [intellect] value for this test. If you succeed, discover 3 clues at your location. If this test fails, deal 2 damage to that enemy.

name: "I'm too old for this sh..."
text: If you succeed this test, heal 1 horror and draw a card. If you fail, heal 2 horror instead.

name: Security Guard
text:
Uses (1 supplies).
You get +1 [combat].

[reaction] After you spend at least 1 ammo, exhaust Security Guard: Place 1 supply on <fullname>.
<hs>
[free] Exhaust <fullname> and spend 3 supplies: Automatically evade an enemy at your location.
<hs>

name: Hunt them Down
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Max once per round.
You may take an additional 4 actions this turn. At the beginning of next round, you lose 3 - X actions, where X is the number of actions you ended you did spend last round.

name: Insult
text:
Fast..
Choose an enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move up to 3 damage on it to this card.

[reaction] When the attached enemy attacks Insult's owner: It deals 1 less horror for this attack..
<hs>
<rea> After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 2 cards. Gain 2 resources for each damage on <fullname>.

name: "I'm Gonna Need a Bigger Gun."
text: You can only commit this card to a Fight test you are performing on a Firearm asset. If you succeed, move all the ammo from a card you control to this card. Discard that card and play a Firearm asset from you hand, reducing it's cost by the cost of the card you discarded. Move all ammo from this card to the played Firearm.

name: Dave Reacher
text:
Handlocked.
While the leftmost card in your hand is an event card: You get +1 [intellect]. Otherwise, you get +1 [willpower].

[free] Exhaust Dave Reacher: Discard the leftmost card in your hand to draw a card, or move it to the rightmost position of your hand instead.

name: Laboratory Coat
text:
Handlocked.

Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
[reaction] At the start of the upkeep phase, exhaust Laboratory Coat: Move the leftmost card in your hand to the rightmost position.

name: "Do as I do."
text: Fast. Play only after making a test as your first action. Choose another investigator at your location. They take an action of the same type as your first action. This action does not count toward the number of actions they can take each turn. If they succeed a skill test, lose 1 action and you both gain 2 resources (types include activate, evade, fight, and investigate).

name: Eldritch Research
text: Take 1 horror. Discard the top 5 card of your deck. Add up to 2 Insight cards discarded this way to your hand.

name: Following the Trail
text: Handlocked. While this card is in your hand's middle position, it gains fast. Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you may automatically evade an enemy at your location instead of discovering a clue.

name: Glint From Afar
text: Handlocked. Glint From Afar cannot be played. forced Whenever is leftmost card in your hand: Shuffle it into your deck and draw a card. [reaction] After you take a Move action while is in the right side of your hand: Discard this card and move an investigator at a connecting location to your location or visa versa.

name: Rampant Search
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed and have a modified skill value of least 3 [combat] during this skill test, including icons on cards you commited, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Snopping Around
text:
Fast. Play only at the start of the mythos phase.
Look at the top 9 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy and spawn it engaged with you. Attach Snopping Around to it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

[reaction] When an investigator defeats an enemy with <fullname> attached to it: That investigator discovers 1 clue at their location and you heal 1 horror.

name: Mysterious Ledgers
text: Handlocked. Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation (+3 if you have 2 or more Insight cards in your hand). If you succeed, you may move a card in your hand to any position. Then, play an Insight card from you hand.

flavor: "I just need to beat them at there own game. Easy."
name: Sinister Challenge
text: Reduce the cost to play Sinister Challenge by 1 for every 4 cards in your hand. Investigate. Investigate with a base [intellect] value of 1. (If cost 0 to play, this test is automatically successful.) If you succeed, discover 3 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

name: Seeing the Big Picture
text: Exceptional. Handlocked. You cannot choose to commit Seeing the Big Picture. forced At the end of the round, move 1 position to the left. While it is the the leftmost card in your hand, it cannot change positions and you must commit it to the next eligible skill test you perform. While is in your hand, reduce the cost of Insight cards you play by 1.

name: Heather Freeman
text:
While you have more than 7 cards in hand you gain +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discard a card, exhaust Heather Freeman: Draw a card. You may discard the card you drew. If you do, draw a card.

name: Shroud of the Old Ones
text:
<> When an enemy would spawn at your location, exhaust Shroud of the Old Ones: Choose a connecting location with clues on it. Then, test
[intellect] (4). If you succeed, spawn that enemy at the chosen location instead, if able.

name: Timelocked
text: Exceptional. During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not draw a card. While you have no cards in your deck, you get +1 [willpower] , +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], +1 [agility] and may take an additional action during your turn. [reaction] After this card enters play: Discard your hand and draw 5 cards. forced Cards that would shuffle into your deck are removed from the game, instead.

name: Bookkeeping
text:
If your discard has at least...

- ...10 cards, you may draw a card.
<hs>
<bul>...15 cards, your location gets -1 shroud until the end of this round. 
<hs>
<bul>...20 cards, discover 2 clues at your location.
<hs>
<bul>...25 cards, discover 1 clue at any location.
<hs>
You may shuffle your discard into your deck.

name: Tome of Memories
text: You get +1 skill value while resolving skill tests on event cards. forced At the start of your turn, add an Insight card from your discard to your hand. At the end of your turn, remove that card from the game.

name: Inner Lining
text:
Handlocked. Uses (3 supplies).
[reaction] When you play the card in the middle position of your hand, spend 1 supply and exhaust Inner Lining: Place 1 supply or ammo on another asset card you control.

name: Oddly Shaped Key
text: Fast. Limit 1 per deck. [action] Investigate. If a +1, +0, or [eldersign] token is revealed during this test, attach Oddly Shaped Key to this location. Otherwise, return this card to your hand. (Max 1 test per location) Attached location gains: "The owner of this card automatically succeeds basic investigate tests at this location."

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (0 supplies). Limit 10 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 supply on this card.

[action] Discard <fullname>: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Discarded Evidence
text:
If you have an odd number of cards after playing Discarded Evidence, gain 2 resources and draw a card.

If you have an even number of cards after playing <fullname>, gain 3 resources, you may discard a card to draw a card.

name: "Let Me See That!"
text: Use a [action] on an Item asset controlled by another investigator at your location, as if that asset was under your control. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: The First to Flinch
text: Group limit 1 copy of The First to Flinch in play. Fast. Play after you draw a non-weakness treachery card, but before resolving that card's effects. Put into play in your play area and attach that encounter card to it instead of resolving it. forced After an investigator fails a skill test on an encounter card, they draw the attached card. Then, discard .

name: Unstable Terrain
text: Evade. You get +1 [agility] for this evade. If you succeed and have a modified skill value of least 3 [willpower] during this skill test, including icons on cards you commited, you deal the evaded enemy 1 damage.

name: "Who's counting?"
text: Fight. Perform a Fight action using a Weapon asset you control with no ammo remaining, as if it had 1 ammo. If you succeed, place 1 ammo on the Weapon asset used. Otherwise, discard the Weapon asset and the enemy immediately attacks you.

name: Working the Angles
text:
Handlocked.
While commiting Working the Angles, if it was in
your hand's...

  - ...right half, <fullname> gains a [willpower] icon.
<hs>
  <bul>...left half, <fullname> gains a [agility] icon.
<hs>
  <bul>...middle position, <fullname> gains "If this test is successful, draw 1 card."
<hs>

name: Flawless Execution
text: If you commit this card to a skill test on an event card you played and you succeed: Gain X resources, where X is the cost of the event card when you played it.

name: Klabb
text: Handlocked. Uses (4 ammo). If Klabb was the leftmost card in your hand when playing it: Place 2 additional ammo on this card. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack and you deal +1 damage. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 ammo from .

name: Platinum Club
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for every 3 resources in your resource pool (Max +5 ). As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may exhaust Platinum Club. If you do, you deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (0 supplies). Limit 15 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 resource on this card. (Limit 15 resources)

[free] Discard <fullname>: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Deal Closer
text: Handlocked. Fight. This attack deals +1 damage. If before playing Deal Closer, right of it was at least... - ...2 cards, Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. ...5 cards, this attack deals an additional +2 damage.

name: Royal Flush
text:
Handlocked. Fast. Royal Flush can only be played while it is the leftmost card in your hand.
Gain 2 resources, draw 2 cards, and you may take an additional 2 actions on your turn. Remove <fullname> from the game.

name: Underworld Couriers
text:
Handlocked.
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].

At the start of each round, the cards currently in the left most and middle position of your hand become the "Package", until the end of the round.
<hs>
[reaction] After you play a Package card, exhaust Underworld Couriers: Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.

name: Celestial Inscriptions
text:
Uses (5 Charges)
[reaction] When a token is released during a skill test, exhaust Celestial Inscriptions and spend 1 charge: Increase that tokens modifier by +2 for this test.

name: Rending
text: Uses (2 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to return it to your hand. [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If you fail, remove 1 charge from .

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (2 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or spend 2 resource to return it to your hand. [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, remove 1 charge from .

name: Flickering Memories
text: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. You get +2 for this test. If you succeed and have a modified skill value of least 3 during this skill test, including icons on cards you commited, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Recreation
text: Shuffle a card into your deck. Search the top 9 cards of your deck for 2 cards that share at least 1 trait with the shuffled card, and draw them. Shuffle your deck.

name: Shockwave
text: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 for this test. If you succeed and have a modified skill value of least 3 during this skill test, including icons on cards you commited, this attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-Elite).

name: Old Ideas, New Methods
text:
You get +1 [combat], +1 [intellect], and +1 [agility] during this skill test.

If you succed and this skill test used your <com>, <int>, and/or <agi> in any way: Heal 1 horror.

name: Infuse Strength
text:
Uses (3 Charges).

You may commit cards with [willpower] icons to any type of test. You may use <wil> and [wild] icons on cards you commit to boost your <wil> during these tests.
[free] During a skill test on an event card that does not use your <wil> in any way, spend 1 charge on Infuse Strength: Add your <wil> value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, place 1 charge on <fullname>.

name: Predict Fate
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to an Ally asset you control. Attached asset gets +1 health. [free] Exhaust Predict Fate: Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck. Draw a card. forced When leaves play, take 2 horror.

name: Disrupt Reality
text: Myriad. Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to your location or a connecting location. That location is "dimensionally unstable" until Disrupt Reality leaves play. Group limit 3 in play. [free] An investigator at your location moves to a dimensionally unstable location. Discard this card or discard a card to shuffle it into your deck(Activates from any location).

name: Look to the Stars
text:
This card is also a [survivor] level 2 card.
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would fail a skill test after revealing a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token. (Limit 1 Look to the Stars per test.)

They get +2 to their skill value for that test. Reveal another token. If this skill test fails, return <fullname> to your hand.

name: Blesssing From Above
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing. When you commit this card, 1 of your skills gets +2 for the duration of this test.
If multiple chaos tokens were revealed during this skill test, you may return Blesssing From Above to your hand when this test ends.

name: Shackles of the Deep
text: Exceptional. While there is only 1 enemy engaged with you, they cannot make attacks of opportunity. When you move, non-Elite enemies disengage from you first. [action] Fight. This attack uses your [willpower] instead of [combat]. If your is within 2 skill value of your before revealing a chaos token, then you get +3 and deal +2 damage for this attack.

name: The Present Future
text: Exceptional. You have 1 additional arcane slot. [reaction] After a Spell or Ritual asset you control leaves play, exhaust The Present Future: Search the top 3 cards of your deck of a Spell or Ritual card and draw it or play it (paying it cost).

name: Rending
text: Uses (3 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or shuffle it back into your deck. You may spend 2 resource to return it to your hand, instead. [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, remove 1 charge from .

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (3 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or shuffle it back into your deck. You may spend 2 resource to return it to your hand, instead. [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect].You get +2 for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, remove 1 charge from .

name: Hand Wraps
text: Uses (2 grit). Limit 1 per investigator. You get +1 [combat] during basic attack actions. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy with a basic fight action, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wraps: Choose a level 0 Innate skill card in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.

name: Lucky Rabbit
text: [free] Discard Lucky Rabbit: Search the top 8 cards of your deck for a Item card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "Someones gotta stop this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, discard a card and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 2 resources.

name: Work Boots
text: Limit 1 Footwear per investigator. You get +2 [agility] during evade actions. [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Work Boots: Take a basic fight action against the evaded enemy.

name: Mysteries of the Forest
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] during this skill test for each Creature card you control and/or is in your discard. If you succeed and have at least 3 Creature cards in your control and/or is in your discard, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Soul Searching
text: Investigate. This investigation uses your highest skill value, instead of [intellect]. If you succeed and a different skill has a modified skill value of at least 4 skill value during this skill test, including icons on cards you commited, you may heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy during a basic evade action you are performing. While this card is in your discard, you get +1 [agility]. forced At the end of the round, if is in your discard; shuffle into your deck. If you cannot, remove from the game.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy during a basic investigate action you are performing. While is in your discard, you get +1 [intellect]. forced At the end of the round, if is in your discard; shuffle into your deck. If you cannot, remove from the game.

name: Ragey
text: You can only commit Ragey during a basic fight action you are performing. While this card is in your discard, you get +1 [combat]. forced At the end of the round, if is in your discard; shuffle into your deck. If you cannot, remove from the game.

name: Survival Skills
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.

While Survival Skills is committed to a skill test, you get +2  to 1 of your skills ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]) that does not have the highest base value.

flavor: "Someones gotta stop this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, discard at least 1 card and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 2 resources. If you discarded 2 cards, draw a card.

name: Two Bodies, One Grave
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test for a basic fight action.
This attack deals +1 damage. Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location. If the attacked enemy is engaged with another investigator, this attack deals no damage to that investigator.

name: Hand Wrap
text: Uses (4 grit). Limit 1 per investigator. You get +2 [combat] during basic attack actions. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy with a basic fight action, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wrap: Choose a level 0-1 Innate skill card in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy during a basic evade action you are performing. While this card is in your discard, you get +1 [agility] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic evade action. forced At the end of the round, if is in your discard; shuffle into your deck. If you cannot, remove from the game.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy during a basic investigate action you are performing. While is in your discard, you get +1 [intellect] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic investigate action. forced At the end of the round, if is in your discard; shuffle into your deck. If you cannot, remove from the game.

name: Ragey
text: You can only commit Ragey during a basic fight action you are performing. While this card is in your discard, you get +1 [combat] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic fight action.. forced At the end of the round, if is in your discard, shuffle into your deck. If you cannot, remove from the game.

name: Goal Oriented
text:
This card is also a [seeker] level 0 card.
If this skill test is successful during an investigate, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 clue.

If this skill test is successful during an attack, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 enemy.

name: Shattered Timepiece
text: Exceptional. Uses (0 charges). [reaction] After an enemy enters your location, place 1 charge on Shattered Timepiece. [free] Spend 3 charges and exhaust : Choose an investigator or non-Elite enemy at your location. Move them to a location up to 2 connections away.

name: Mask of the Forgotten
text:
[reaction] That the start of the round, exhaust Mask of the Forgotten: For the remainder of this round you get
-1 [willpower], -1 [agility], and can parley enemies at your location as if there were humanoid.

name: Ring of Desire
text: Choose your skill with the lowest base value. Increase the base value of that skill by 1.

name: Calm the Nerves
text: Test [willpower] (3), you get +1 <wil> for each Calm the Nerves in the victory display. If you succeed, heal 1 horror and add this card to the victory display. (Limit 1 attempt per game).

name: Life Experience
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

You may commit Life Experience to any type of test.
You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility] for this skill test. 
<hs>
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.

name: Circlet of Sealing
text: During the enemy phase, enemies at your location have -1 fight and evade.

name: Essence of Humanitiy
text:
This card can only be purchased once by 1 investigator per campaign.
When the owner of this card would take trauma, cancel 1 of it and exile Essence of Humanitiy.

flavor: "I can feel them crawling under my skin!"
name: Delusional Parasitosis
text: Revelation Place Delusional Parasitosis into play in your threat area. forced At the end of your turn: If there are no other investigators at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] : Discard .

name: Overshadowed
text: Revelation Place Overshadowed into play in your threat area. forced At the end of your turn: If an enemy was defeated at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] : Discard .
